item.title: Maintaining a Stable Protobuf API
item.description: This is a cross-post originally written for the Buf blog. The first day of the rest of your life Congrats! You’ve hit a stable release or maybe you haven’t and instead customers have already decided to depend on your API. Rather than pulling the rug out from beneath your users, you’ve taken it upon yourself to keep everyone happy. Now that you’ve been tasked with maintaining API compatibility, you’ll need a guiding light to copy for inspiration.
